column2: title=Hobbits in Holland: Leven en werk van JRR Tolkien (1892-1973)
issn=0169-3557, 41 (''Tentoonstellingscatalogi en -brochures van de Koninklijke Bibliotheek'')

column1: '''''Hobbits in Holland: Leven en werk van JRR Tolkien (1892-1973)''''' is a Dutch-language exhibition catalogue. Apart from a richly commented catalogue section there appears the following articles: "Een biographische schets van Ronald Tolkien" (pp. 5-14), and "Tolkien en Nederland" (pp. 15-35), the latter treats [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s visit to Holland in [[1958]].<ref>[[Åke Bertenstam]], ''[http://www.forodrim.org/bibliography/tolklist.html A Chronological Bibliography of Books about Tolkien]'', as of 24 August 2010</ref>. The catalogue also includes a [[Letter to Mr Joukes
column2: letter from Tolkien to a Mr Joukes]].<ref>[[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]] (HarperCollins''Publishers'' 2008), ''[[The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion]]'', pp. 68, 579</ref>
